==Steps==
# Defeat the Ruin Drakes

==Request Details==
{{Quest Description|Ruin Drakes are raging...}}
===Request from Ophelia===
"Tales of Humanity":<br><!--
-->Due to an ambush by Ruin Drakes, many members of the Adventurers' Guild have lost valued personal belongings.<br><!--
-->To this end, the Guild is looking for someone capable of dealing with the {{color|buzzword|Ruin Drakes}} responsible.<br><!--
-->You will be amply rewarded for your generous support.
